name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @conor64: Wow, just watched the Miami episode of Parts Unknown and realized that (I'm guessing) Anthony Bourdain or (possibly) one of his directors did a homage to The Great Beauty, one of my favorite films, which I wrote about here:
 https://t.co/kvUfYzuE0W

name: TheAtlantic
text: "America owes its macroeconomic good fortune to Washington muscling through a giant and successful stimulus in the spring," @AnnieLowrey writes: https://t.co/9dXAcGxt71

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Climate-related catastrophes will also worsen, unless we accept responsibility for them and change behavior on a global scale. For that, we need to remember their terrible impact on our daily lives," @kalophile writes: https://t.co/Z3wuefHTO9
